statements: SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0;
SELECT post_content, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM sentiment_analysis_data;
SELECT post_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score < 0 ORDER BY post_id ASC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score = 0;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE post_content LIKE '%happy%' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, post_id ASC;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM sentiment_analysis_data GROUP BY post_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY post_count DESC, post_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_data;
SELECT post_id, post_text FROM sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_data ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_data WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT * FROM user_data ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC;
SELECT post_id, post_text FROM sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY post_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT username, followers_count FROM user_data WHERE followers_count < 1000 ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT * FROM sentiment_data WHERE post_text LIKE '%happy%'
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score = (SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) FROM sentiment_data)
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_posts;
SELECT post_content, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_posts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_type FROM sentiment_results WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_posts ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_posts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM sentiment_analysis_posts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM sentiment_analysis_posts WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_type FROM sentiment_results WHERE sentiment_type = 'positive' AND confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN sentiment_analysis_posts ON users.user_id = sentiment_analysis_posts.user_id;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_scores;
SELECT sentiment_score, post_id FROM sentiment_scores;
SELECT post_text, author_id FROM post_details WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT author_name, followers_count FROM author_details ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM sentiment_categories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_scores WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_text, author_name FROM post_details INNER JOIN author_details ON post_details.author_id = author_details.author_id;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM post_details WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM sentiment_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT author_name, followers_count FROM author_details ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sentiments;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_text FROM Sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_id, post_date FROM Posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT username, user_type FROM Users WHERE user_type = 'admin';
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_id, analysis_result FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE analysis_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM Posts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, user_type FROM Users WHERE user_type = 'admin';
SELECT sentiment_text, sentiment_score FROM Sentiments WHERE sentiment_id = 10;
SELECT post_content, post_date, username FROM Posts JOIN Users ON Posts.user_id = Users.user_id;
